Nếu bạn chưa thấy Phòng: If you have not seen your Apartment
\nNếu bạn chưa thấy các Dịch vụ: If you do not see your Services
Chào mừng trở lại!\nRất vui khi thấy bạn:
Welcome back!
Nice to see you!
Bạn vui lòng thử lại sau, chức năng hiện: Please try again later, this function is not yet complete.
Đừng lo lắng! Nó xảy ra. Vui lòng nhập đ: Don't worry! It happens. Please enter the email address associated with your account.
Bạn nhập mã mời sai!: You entered the wrong invitation code!
Bạn đã có tài khoản?: Do you already have an account?
\nNhập 1: nếu là nam \nNhập 0: nếu là nữ:
Enter 1: if male 
Enter 0: if female
Đã gửi đường liên kết sửa mật khẩu, hãy: Password reset link sent, please check your email.
Người dùng chưa nhập CODE của quản lý đư: Users have not entered the manager's CODE, please click Add CODE
Hãy báo chủ căn hộ thêm dịch vụ cho bạn: Please tell the apartment owner to add services for you
Bạn chưa được thêm dịch vụ tháng này: You have not been added to the service this month.
Người dùng đã có mặc định dữ liệu nhưng: The user already has default data but has not been added to the room
Hãy báo với chủ hộ thêm cho bạn vào phòn: Please tell the head of the household to add you to the room.
Hãy thêm Toà Nhà Chung Cư hay Nhà Trọ để: Please add an Apartment Building or Dormitory to start managing
Hãy tạo 1 Tòa nhà chung cư / Nhà trọ của: Please create your own Apartment Building / Dormitory
Hãy chọn 1 trong 2 lựa chọn: Please choose one of the two options.
Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa dịch vụ này?: Are you sure you want to delete this service?
Bạn có chắc chắn rằng muốn xóa tầng này?: Are you sure you want to delete this floor?
Không được thêm như: Tầng 1 phòng 1 hay:
Cannot be added as: Floor 1 Room 1 or Floor 2 Room 1

It must be added as: Floor 2 starting from the last room number of Floor 1. For example, if the last room on Floor 1 is 15, then Floor 2 should start at Room 16.
Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa phòng này?: Are you sure you want to delete this room?
Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa người thuê này: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant?
Bạn có chắc chắn phòng này chưa dóng tiề: Are you sure this room has not paid?
Bạn có chắc chắn phòng này đã dóng tiền?: Are you sure this room has paid?
Please enter the full email address...
Enter the email of the person you want to search for..
Số lượng tòa nhà chung cư bạn tạo đã đạt: The number of apartment buildings you have created has reached the limit.
không được tìm thấy trong danh sách ngườ: Not found in the user list
Một phòng cùng tên đã tồn tại ở tầng này: A room with the same name already exists on this floor.
Một tầng có cùng tên đã tồn tại trên Tòa: A floor with the same name already exists in this apartment building.
Không tìm thấy phòng, do chưa có người ở: Room not found, as it is not yet occupied. Please delete the room you just created
Floor not found, as it is not yet occupied. Please delete the room you just created
Tháng này bạn đã ghi biên lai dịch vụ ch: You have already issued a service receipt for the apartment this month
Bạn đã được thêm vào phòng!: You have been added to a room!
Hãy vào xem phòng của mình, bạn đã được: Check your room, you have been added to a room by the Manager!
Hãy vào xem chi tiết dịch vụ mới, bạn đã: Check the details of the new service, you have been added service {idServiceName} for the month: {Month}
Hãy vào xem chi tiết {content}, quản lý: Check the details of {content}, the manager has updated the rules
Hãy vào xem chi tiết {title}, bạn đã bị: Check the details of {title}, you have been added 1 violation by the manager
bạn đã hết vi phạm 1 lỗi nào đó: You no longer have that particular violation
Hãy vào xem chi tiết dịch vụ. Quản lý đã: Check the service details. The manager has confirmed that you have paid for 1 service this month
Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa tài khoản này?: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
Tôi đồng ý với chính sách bảo mật: I agree with the privacy policy
You need to agree with the privacy policy.
privacy_policy_content:
Privacy Policy

This privacy policy applies to the Apartment - Dormitory Management app (hereby referred to as "Application") for mobile devices that was created by ZennyVN (hereby referred to as "Service Provider") as a free service. This service is intended for use "AS IS".

Information Collection and Use
The Application collects information when you download and use it. This information may include:
- Personal Information: Email, phone, Citizen Identification Card, Address, sex, full name
- Device Information: Your device's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), the operating system you use on your mobile device
- Usage Data: The pages of the Application that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and the time spent on the Application

We collect this information for the purpose of personalization and application development. This information will be stored in Firebase as we use Firebase as our database.

We collect and use your personal information for the following specific purposes:
- Identity verification
- Service provision
- User experience improvement
- Data analysis
- Spam account management

Email: Your email will be used to create an account. We will store and query it to assist the apartment manager in managing you, such as searching for you, your apartment, locking your account, and assigning violations of building rules. It will also help users log in, access their apartment, services, rules, check if they have violated any rules, and view and message within the group. It also helps you recover your password.

Phone: Your phone number will only be used to help the landlord contact you and is not unique and you do not need to authenticate.

Citizen Identification Card: The Citizen Identification Card is only used for the landlord to verify your identity, help the landlord contact you and is not unique and you do not need to authenticate.

Sex: is only used for the landlord to verify your identity and is not unique, helps display your avatar and you do not need to authenticate.

Address: will only be used to help the landlord contact you and is not unique and you do not need to authenticate.

Full Name: will only be used to help the landlord contact you and is not unique and you do not need to authenticate.

We will only process your personal data when there is a reasonable legal basis, including:
- Your consent
- Contract performance
- Legal obligations
- Our legitimate interests

We will store your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purposes or for the duration required by law.

Under the law, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
- Right to refuse
- The right to access
- The right to rectify
- The right to delete (in app setting part)
- The right to restrict processing
- The right to data portability

We may share your personal data with trusted third parties in the following circumstances:
- Service providers
- Business partners
- Authorized government agencies

We are committed to protecting your personal information with appropriate technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, loss, or destruction of data. Your information will only be accessible to us, the landlord you registered with, and the Firebase service provider.

If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at: laptrinh03022024@gmail.com.

Third-Party Access
The Application utilizes third-party services that have their own privacy policies regarding data handling. Below are links to the privacy policies of the third-party service providers used by the Application:
- [Google Play Services Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/privacy)
- [AdMob Privacy Policy](https://support.google.com/admob/answer/6128543?hl=en)
- [Google Analytics for Firebase Privacy Policy](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Firebase Crashlytics Privacy Policy](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)

The Service Provider may disclose User Provided information:
- As required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process
- When they believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect their rights, your safety, or the safety of others
- With their trusted service providers who work on their behalf, do not have an independent use of the information we disclose to them, and have agreed to adhere to the rules set forth in this privacy statement

Opt-Out Rights
You can stop all collection of information by the Application easily by uninstalling it. You may use the standard uninstall processes available as part of your mobile device or via the mobile application.

Data Retention Policy
The Service Provider will retain User Provided data for as long as you use the Application and for a reasonable time thereafter. If you'd like us to delete User Provided Data that you have provided via the Application, please contact us at laptrinh03022024@gmail.com, and we will respond in a reasonable time.

Children
The Service Provider does not knowingly solicit data from or market to children under the age of 13. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided personal information, we will immediately delete this information from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us at laptrinh03022024@gmail.com so that we can take the necessary actions.

Security - Privacy
We are deeply committed to ensuring the confidentiality and security of your personal information. To protect the data we process and maintain, we implement a variety of security measures, including physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards. For instance, we use encryption techniques to secure your data during transmission and storage, and we enforce strict access controls to limit who can access your information within our systems.

If you wish to delete your account, you can do so easily through the settings section of the app. Upon deletion, all associated data will be permanently removed from our systems, except where retention is required for legal or security purposes.

I have integrated APIs with Firebase and Google AdMob. Firebase will store user data as it is where I store the data. Firebase has a privacy policy that ensures my data is not disclosed.

Changes
This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time for any reason. We will notify you of any changes to the Privacy Policy by updating this page with the new Privacy Policy. You are advised to consult this Privacy Policy regularly for any changes, as continued use is deemed approval of all changes.

Notify users about changes in the privacy policy, for example: sending emails, in-app notifications. Provide specific contact information so users can reach out with questions or complaints about the privacy policy.

This privacy policy is effective as of 2024-08-23.

Your Consent
By using the Application, you consent to the processing of your information as set forth in this Privacy Policy now and as amended by us.

Contact Us
If you have any questions regarding privacy while using the Application, or have questions about the practices, please contact us via email at laptrinh03022024@gmail.com.

This privacy policy page was generated by App Privacy Policy Generator
